```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r gesamt}
dosen <- 1.77947e6
fatality <- 73656/2581329
thrombosis_risk_vacc <- 7/1.6e6
aktuelle_inzidenz <- 83.7
rate_new_cases_7days <- aktuelle_inzidenz/100000

paste(round(thrombosis_risk_vacc*dosen), "mgl. Trombosen")
paste(round(fatality*rate_new_cases_7days*dosen), "Todesfaelle verhindert")
paste(round(fatality*rate_new_cases_7days*2*dosen), "Todesfaelle verhindert bei doppelter Inzidenz")
```
